section.heading: Local food economy study.
section.text: The Office of Planning shall conduct a study of the state of the local food economy. The focus of the study shall include:

para.text: Obstacles and opportunities for new and existing businesses;
Opportunities for job growth and workforce development;
Geographic areas in the District that have a well-developed food economy;
Geographic areas in the District that have a poorly developed food economy; and
Opportunities for government investments to improve the local food economy.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 days) creation of third-party food delivery commissions, see § 205 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).

For temporary (90 days) requirement that the Food Policy Director make publicly available a study that evaluates and makes recommendations regarding food access needs during and following the COVID-19 public health emergency, see § 513 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-326, May 27, 2020, 67 DCR 7045).

For temporary (225 days) creation of third-party food delivery commissions, see § 205 of Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-328, June 8, 2020, 67 DCR 7598).

Act 23-328, June 8, 2020, 67 DCR 7598).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of third-party food delivery commissions, see § 2(a) of Coronavirus Support Clarification Emergency Amendment Act of 2020 (D.C. Act 23-332, July 7, 2020, 67 DCR 8609).
For temporary (90 days) creation of third-party food delivery commissions, see § 205 of Coronavirus Support Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-30, Mar. 17, 2021, 68 DCR 003101).

For temporary (90 days) creation of third-party food delivery commissions, see § 205 of Coronavirus Support Congressional Review Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-96, June 7, 2021, 68 DCR 006025).
For temporary (225 days) creation of third-party food delivery commissions, see § 205 of Coronavirus Support Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-9, June 24, 2021, 68 DCR 004824).

For temporary (90 days) amendment of third-party food delivery commissions, see § 3(h) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Emergency Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Act 24-125, July 24, 2021, 68 DCR 007342).

For temporary (225 days) amendment of third-party food delivery commissions, see § 3(h) of Public Emergency Extension and Eviction and Utility Moratorium Phasing Temporary Amendment Act of 2021 (D.C. Law 24-39, Oct. 27, 2021, 68 DCR 009487).
